data_table.description: NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS1
variable.description: Q1. Memory chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS2
variable.description: Q2. Language chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS3
variable.description: Q3. Visuospatial chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS4
variable.description: Q4. ExFunction chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS5
variable.description: Q5. Attention chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS6
variable.description: Q6. Total number of failed domains [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS7
variable.description: Q7. Memory, language, visuospatial or Ef domain missing [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS8
variable.description: Q8. DWR Decline chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS9
variable.description: Q9. DSS Decline chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS10
variable.description: Q10. WF decline chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS11
variable.description: Q11. Summary score of substantial decline [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS12
variable.description: Q12. Selected for clinic visit chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS13
variable.description: Q13. Selected for home visit chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS14
variable.description: Q14. Selected for B12 and TSH chain [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]

variable.name: NSS0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [NSS Stage 2-3 Selection Form]
